dialogue.htmlContent:
As you walk around this particular corner of the first-floor corridor, you catch the faint scent of Lilaya's perfume lingering in the air. Turning towards the nearest door, you see a little heart-shaped sign has been affixed to it, which reads: 'Lilaya's Room'.

#IF(!game.isExtendedWorkTime())

Obviously being the source of your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s fragrance, you take a step towards her bedroom, taking note of the fact that the door is firmly shut. After giving the handle a brief twist, you discover that [style.colourBad(the door is locked)], so if you wanted to take a look inside, you'd have to come back during the day when it's open...

#ELSE

Obviously being the source of your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s fragrance, you take a step towards her bedroom, taking note of the fact that the door is slightly ajar. With nobody around to stop you, you could always take a peek inside if you really wanted to...

#ENDIF

Turning the door's handle, you discover, just as you suspected, that it's not locked. Carefully peeking through the widening gap in the door as you push it open, you breathe a sigh of relief as you see that the room is currently deserted. Stepping forwards and closing the door behind you, you find yourself standing in your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s bedroom.

As you take in your surrounds, you discover that you're surrounded on all sides by every shade of pink imaginable. From the pale rose hue of the walls, to the offensively bright hot pink sheets on her bed, you feel as though you can probably take a reasonable guess as to what Lilaya's favourite colour is. Some pieces of furniture, which have been painted white, along with the white ceiling and thick, cream carpet underfoot, are the only parts of her room that aren't one type of pink or another.

Continuing to look around her room, the next thing that you notice is just how messy it is. The doors of her ceiling-height wardrobe have been left wide open, with all manner of clothing tumbling out onto the floor in front of it. The chests of drawers are all half-closed, and every available surface is piled high with makeup, brushes, clothing, and all sorts of other miscellaneous items. This mess even extends out into the main body of the room, with the floor being a complete minefield of dirty clothing, shoes, bags, hairbrushes, and every type of accessory you could possibly imagine. Navigating through this mess to take a look into her en-suite bathroom, you see crumpled towels, discarded bath robes, and all sorts of shampoo bottles littering the marble floor.

The huge, four-poster bed that dominates one side of the room seems to be the crowing achievement of Lilaya's messiness. A huge pile of clothes has been stacked up on top of the hot pink sheets, and you find yourself wondering how on earth she manages to sleep in there.

Lilaya must have told Rose to not tidy her room up, and you wonder what possible reason your aunt would have for letting her room get into such a state as this.

As you look around the room, you can't help but notice a large pile of your aunt's discarded, dirty underwear stacked up next to her bed. You wonder if you should turn around and make your exit, or do something naughty instead...

First moving over to make sure that the door is firmly closed, you then turn back towards the pile of Lilaya's panties. With dirty thoughts on your mind, you quickly navigate through the chaotic mess of your aunt's bedroom floor, and soon find yourself standing next to the dirty laundry.

Glancing over once more to make sure that nobody's entered the room, you drop down onto your knees before the enticing heap of clothing. Reaching out, you grab the closest pair of panties, letting out an excited hum as you lift them up and give them an experimental stretch.

Delighted by the way the soft fabric feels in your [pc.hands], you can't resist taking a closer look at Lilaya's underwear. Bringing them up to your face, you gently squeeze and pull at the stretchy fabric, breathing in the faint scent of musk and perfume as your [pc.hands] move ever closer to your nose. Your demonic aunt's scent is exactly the same as it was in your old world, and you find the familiar smell to be extremely comforting.

Having gone this far already, you let your knees slide out to either side of you, and, sinking down onto your [pc.ass+], you lean forwards and rest your head on the pile of panties. Letting out a deep, relaxed sigh, you find yourself enveloped in your aunt's comforting fragrance.

After several minutes of slowly rummaging through the pile of panties, you wonder if you should make your exit. Then again, it doesn't look like anyone's going to disturb you, and you wonder if you should take things a little further...

You decide that you've already taken things far enough, and, returning the panties in your [pc.hands] back to the pile, you stand up. Weaving your way through the minefield of clothing that is your aunt's bedroom floor, you quickly find yourself at the door, and, pushing it open, you step back out into the corridor beyond.

The familiar scent of your aunt is too much for you to simply leave behind. Grabbing the topmost pair, you quickly bring them up to your nose, before taking a desperate, deep breath. The musky, perfume-laced scent of Lilaya overwhelms your senses, and you feel a distinct heat rising in your groin.

#IF(!pc.hasLegs()) Pushing yourself up into a sitting position, you reach down between to your groin and start touching yourself. #ELSEIF(pc.isTaur()) Pushing yourself up onto your knees once again, you push your rear-end back against one of the posts of Lilaya's bed and rub against it in order to masturbate. #ELSE Pushing yourself up onto your knees once again, you reach down between your legs and start touching yourself. #ENDIF Breathing in Lilaya's scent once again, you find yourself letting out a desperate whine as you imagine the soft fabric rubbing up against her wet pussy. Suddenly, the silence of the room is broken by the faint sound of footsteps outside in the corridor. Your [pc.eyes] open wide, and, remaining perfectly still so as to be able to listen, you hear the person approaching Lilaya's bedroom door.

You only have a split second to decide what to do. Being right next to the bed, you could quickly dive under it and hide, or, if you were feeling bolder, you could quickly hide the used panties behind your back and rush out of the room, making up an excuse to whoever is on the other side. Then again, the person outside could simply be passing by. You could continue to enjoy the panties before you and pay them no heed, but a little voice inside your head is saying that this would be a bad idea...

Gripping the used panties in one [pc.hand], you drop to the floor and crawl under Lilaya's bed. You manage to tuck your [pc.leg] in just as you hear the turning of the handle, right before the door swings open.

From your vantage point beneath the bed, you can just about see through the piles of dirty clothing to the bedroom door, where there now stands the familiar black-and-white heels of Rose. As she enters the room, you can hear her muttering to herself, and, not daring to make any sort of move, you hold your breath as you listen to what it is she's saying.

[rose.speech(Honestly... So this is why she told me not to come in here... She's just begging for some real punishment...)]

Your [pc.eyes] move this way and that as you watch the cat-girl maid moving back and forth around the room. In a distinctly frustrated tone, she continues to mutter to herself, and you make sure to remain completely silent as you listen in.

[rose.speech(I know I left it in here... And she's done so much to deserve it today as well... Ah! There it is!)]

Your eyes widen as you see Rose bend down, and, from out of a particularly large pile of discarded clothing, you see her retrieve a black leather riding crop. The cat-girl maid lets out a devious little laugh, before hurrying back to the bedroom door and making her exit.

You wait until the sound of her footsteps has completely disappeared before crawling out from under the bed. With nothing more to be done in here, you turn towards the door yourself, and prepare to make your exit.

Gripping the used panties in one [pc.hand], you hide them behind your back as you rush over to the bedroom door. Quickly turning the handle, you pull open the door to find yourself standing before a very shocked-looking Rose.

Taking the initiative, you quickly blurt out your excuses, [pc.speech(Ah, hello Rose! I was just checking all of the rooms for any sign of trouble. This one's safe enough!)]

[rose.speech(I wouldn't dare question the motives of one of Mistress's guests, but one might wonder what sort of 'trouble' one would expect to find in her room,)] Rose says, raising one eyebrow as she steps back to make room for you to proceed out into the corridor.

[pc.speech(Ah, well, that's the thing with trouble; you don't know what it is until you find it,)] you say, ignoring Rose's still-raised eyebrow. [pc.speech(Anyway, I need to head back to my room now, I'll see you later, Rose!)]

You hurry off down the corridor, not daring to look back. You can feel Rose's questioning gaze drilling into your back up until the moment you push open your bedroom door and step inside.

Letting out a deep sigh of relief, you thank your lucky stars that you were able to get out of that situation without incident. What's more, you were even able to secure a trophy; that being the pair of used panties still clenched in your [pc.hand]...

You decide that whoever is outside must just be passing by, and continue playing with the pile of Lilaya's panties before you.

The footsteps outside suddenly stop, and you look up to see the door's handle turning. You're unable to make a move before the door suddenly swings open, and you find yourself gazing up into the eyes of a very shocked-looking Rose.

Before you can say anything, the expression on the cat-girl's face quickly shifts into one of mild disgust, and, with an icy tone, she's the first one to break the heavy silence. [rose.speech(What do you think you're doing?)]

[pc.speech(Well, I was just... Erm...)] you start, not sure quite what to say.

[rose.speech(You were just masturbating to Mistress's dirty underwear?)] Rose questions, before curtsying and turning to make her exit. [rose.speech(Well, if you'll excuse me, you do appear to be rather busy, and I have some pressing matters to discuss with Mistress. I wonder what she'll say...)]

You see Rose smirk as she finishes her sentence, as though she's eager to witness Lilaya's reaction to being told what it is you've been up to. As the cat-girl turns to leave, you realise that you only have a moment in which to say something to stop her.

You don't think it would do much good to try and apologise to Rose, so, jumping to your feet, you rush to the door and hurry to block her path down the corridor. Running out in front of her, you turn and plead, [pc.speech(Please, Rose, promise me that you won't tell Lilaya!)]

[rose.speech(I'm sorry, but I can't do that. Now, if you'll excuse me,)] Rose replies, before stepping around you and hurrying off down the stairs.

You let out a frustrated sigh, and, with nothing else to do, you continue on down the corridor and return to the safety of your own room.

[pc.speech(Rose! Wait!)] you call out, and, much to your relief, the cat-girl maid stops in the doorway.

[rose.speech(May I help you?)] Rose asks, failing to hide the devious smirk on her face.

[pc.speech(I'm sorry! Please, don't tell Lilaya! I'm really, really sorry!)] you call out, desperate for Rose to keep this a secret between the two of you.

The hint of sadistic delight in Rose's voice is unmistakable as she curtsies and addresses you once more, [rose.speech(I'm sorry, but this really isn't something that I can keep from Mistress. Have a good day.)]

You let out a frustrated sigh, and, with nothing else to do, you continue on down the corridor and return to the safety of your own room.

The cold, cutting tone of Rose's voice is enough to send a shiver down your spine, but, being offered a way out of this situation, you ignore it and shuffle forwards. [pc.speech(What kind of punishment?)]

Stepping over to one side of the room, she roughly yanks open the top drawer of one of Lilaya's cabinets, and from within, produces a black leather harness, with a large, purple dildo fixed to the front. Holding the strap-on up so that you can clearly see it, she laughs in sadistic pleasure as she states, [rose.speech(This kind of punishment. You let me fuck you with this, and Lilaya never needs to know about your filthy behaviour. Understood?)]
